key-names.name: Store name
key-names.slug: Store URL (to be displayed in the website address - English only)
key-names.categories: What category is your store in?
key-names.country: Is your store in a country?
key-names.province: What province is your store in?
key-names.address: Enter the store address without writing the country and province
key-names.phone: Enter the store's phone number. (without prefix)
key-names.currency: In what currency are your store prices written?
key-names.tax-included: Is tax included in the price? Or should it be calculated and displayed separately?
key-names.tax-included-yes: Yes, the price listed includes Tax is also included
key-names.tax-included-no: No, the price listed does not include tax; it should be calculated and written separately
key-names.tax-percent: How much tax percentage do you charge?
key-names.is-active-no: No, Disabled and don't show publicly
key-names.updated-at: Date the store was last updated

delete.title: Delete restaurant/cafe
delete.subtitle: You can delete your store in this section
delete.delete-description:
Are you sure you want to delete the store '{{name}}'?

By deleting the store, all products, customer information, store route, tables, barcodes, and related settings will be permanently deleted.

This action is irreversible and there is no way to recover the data after deletion.

Please make sure of your decision before continuing.
delete.delete-sure-button: I want to delete the entire store

my-store-description: In this section you can view and edit all your stores
no-store-found: No stores were found; by clicking on this text, you can register a new store.

new.title: Register a new restaurant/cafe
new.subtitle: In this section you can register your new store
new.inserted-successfully: Your store has been successfully registered

edit.title: Edit Restaurant/Cafe
edit.subtitle: In this section you can edit the desired store
edit.updated-successfully: Your store has been successfully edited
edit.there-is-no-changes: You have not made any changes

general.title: General
general.description: In this section you can edit the general settings of the store such as name, route, logo, address, etc.

delete.title: Delete
delete.description: In this section you can completely delete your store.

items.title: Products (items)
items.description: In this section you can add the products and products you want to add to your store.
items.delete-item-sure: Delete product (cannot be returned if clicked again)
items.options-title: Options (for example, you can add multiple drink sizes)
options-samples-idea: In the drink category you can register small, medium and large sizes
In the sandwich category you can set toppings, for example mushrooms, cheese, peppers
In most categories you can add a disposable fork and spoon option
items.item-option-enable-title: What is the status of this option?
items.item-option-count-title: Is this option single or can it have multiples?
items.item-option-required-title: Is selecting this option mandatory or optional?

tables.title: Tables
tables.description: In this section you can customize the tables of your restaurant/cafe.
tables.confirm-delete: Are you sure you want to delete this table?

working-hour.title: Working hours
working-hour.description: In this section you can specify the working hours of your store.
working-hour.store-is-closed-in-this-day: Store is closed on this day.
working-hour.store-is-24-hour-open: Store is open 24 hours on this day.
